name: Spies
description:
Spies is a prototype made in my University.

Is a Retro Coop Assymetric game, inspired in game like Metal Gear and Hack Tag.

Instructions:

Player 1 need to host the game, and the Player 2 needs to connect like a client in the same port.

Player 1 controls the agent using the keyboard arrows, and "Z" and "X" to crounch and prone.

Player 2 controls the hacker, and you can disable the cameras and stun the guards calling to their phones. The hacker needs to keep the right signal with the agent, and all of this functions is using de only the mouse, and the middle button of the mouse.

How i mentioned this game is in development and more features will be added in the future.

Feel free to tell us your feedback and your opinion about our game.

Thanks for playing and have fun.
